title: Council Decision of 9 November 1998 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training
header:
COUNCIL DECISION of 9 November 1998 appointing a member of the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training (98/C 346/03)
THE COUNCIL OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
recitals:
,
Having regard to Council Decision 85/434/EEC of 16 September 1985 setting up an Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training (1), and in particular Articles 3 and 4 thereof,
Whereas by Decision of 23 July 1996 (2) the Council appointed Mr K.-W. GLOMBITZA a member for the period ending on 22 July 1999;
Whereas the German Government has nominated Mr Wolfgang WIEGREBE to replace Mr K.-W. GLOMBITZA,
main_body: Mr Wolfgang WIEGREBE is hereby appointed a member of the Advisory Committee on Pharmaceutical Training in place of Mr K.-W. GLOMBITZA for the remainder of the latter's term of office, which expires on 22 July 1999.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 November 1998.
For the Council
The President
J. FARNLEITNER
(1) OJ L 253, 24.9.1985, p. 43.
(2) OJ C 239, 17.8.1996, p. 5.
